about_the_game:
“Bullet Frenzy” is a strategy game that combines deck building and role-playing. In the game, you will play different roles in a magical western world, explore various interesting places, collect and combine various powerful cards, defeat various enemies with magic bullets, and experience an adventure full of excitement and thrills.

The game features:

Rich card selection: There are different cards in the game, each card has its own effect and attribute, and you can match and use them according to your preferences and strategies.
Unique role-playing: There are 3 different roles in the game, each with its own background story and skills. You can choose your favorite role to play the game. Currently, only a western cowboy character is available. He can attach magic to bullets to attack enemies.
High degree of freedom map system: The game has a randomly generated map system, and there will be different maps and events every time you play. You can explore and choose where you want to go freely, and encounter various interesting characters and situations.
European and American cartoon style: The game uses European and American cartoon style graphics with bright colors, rich details, and dynamic music effects, bringing you a visual and auditory enjoyment.
